# RCSService.GroupChatEvent.participantsAdded(_:)

**Case**

Participants have been added to a group chat.

## Declaration

```swift
case participantsAdded(RCSService.GroupChatParticipantsAddedEvent)
```

## Participant events

- **RCSService.GroupChatParticipantsAddedEvent**: Event triggered when participants are added to a group.
- **RCSService.GroupChatEvent.participantsRemoved(_:)**: Participants have been removed from a group chat.
- **RCSService.GroupChatParticipantsRemovedEvent**: Event triggered when participants are removed from a group.
